Class
Description
Allow
Allows the given method to be called by all given security groups.

Represents a conversation/exchange of information for remote calling.

Records information on a remote call.

MethodUtils
 
NoFunction
Signals that the annotated element is not a remote function.
ObjectEvent
An event which can be bound to a remote object and therefore has a remote object UID.
ObjectMethod
Denotes a method on a remote object.
RemoteAPI
Simply denotes an API interface as being a possible remote API.
RemoteAPI.Inject
Denotes that a field in a registered handler should be dependency injected.

Represents a remote event/callback.
